name: Harvest Solitaire Tripeaks 2
description:
Follow me into the wonderful world of Harvest Solitaire Tripeaks for a surprising adventure! Imagine yourself as a free fish, and write legends in the ocean with all kinds of fish! This is a classic Solitaire card game, drill your brain, pass the obstacles set by the level system, and take down fascinating treasures!

Harvest Solitaire Tripeaks is a fun and challenging solitaire card game for all types of players. Play challenging card games online that will train your brain and keep you sharp or kick back and relax as you enjoy Harvest Solitaire Tripeaks's beautiful game graphics!

FEATURES:
* Easy and Fun, you will pick up quick!
* 10,000+ amazing levels – with more on the way!
* Great graphics and amazing beautiful themes.
* Undersea Journey, unlock new adventures and free bonuses.
* Global Leaderboard - you can compete with players around the world.
* Daily quests, events, activity, challenges, and rewards!
* Enjoy fun mini-games to win grand treasures.
* Collect ocean fish and gradually unlock the secrets of the sea!

GAME HIGHLIGHTS:
- Enjoy your favorite gameplay: Classic Solitaire card game to build your aquariums
- Train your braind and eliminate your boredom through playing solitaire cards
- Unlock more unique aquariums for your lovely fish friends in Solitaire Ocean
- Online adventure tournament, fish players from all over the world compete together
- Design your own decoration and show it to other online players
- Play challenging solitaire cards anywhere without internet conection nor wifi
- Classic klondike card games with creative ways to have endless fun
- Free to download, and fun to play for card game & fish ocean lovers
- Continuously update and introduce the new unique fish and special aquariums!

Play this Harvest Solitaire Tripeaks card game to go on an exciting journey through the magical and mythical world! Free coins, epic cards, power-ups, and more are all up for grabs. Use them to blast through puzzling solitaire levels anytime, anywhere! No Wi-Fi or internet connection is required.

We love to hear your feedbacks or suggestions, so please send them to our email at the following
